chapter.title: Download
chapter.para: You need to download the binaries for Federate Embedded . Note that there are three different artifacts are available for download.

listitem.para: Federate Source - contains all the source code for all modules
Federate Binary - contains all the binary code for all modules
Federate Embedded Kit - contains only required modules and their required 3rd party dependencies

chapter.para: For this Quick Start, download the Federate Embedded Kit and extract this tar/zip file to a directory you can access.

In the expanded directory, you will find "federate-${version}-embedded.jar", which is the main binary jar file for Federate Embedded, and the "lib" and "extension" directories containing supporting 3rd party binaries required to execute Federate Embedded. Later sections describe installing these artifacts.

note.para: Access to physical data sources such as Oracle, MS-SQL Server, DB2, and Sybase through Federate relies upon the user supplying their own JDBC drivers in the deployment. Federate Embedded has been tested extensively with DataDirect If you have access to these JDBC drivers, we recommend their use.
